cohortName: Deep venous thrombosis referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4133004) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Deep venous thrombosis referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4133004) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Deep vein thrombosis events, defined by condition occurrences of Non Cerebral Deep Vein Thrombosis conceptset
Deep vein thrombosis events, defined by condition occurrences of deep vein thrombosis conceptset
logicDescription: Deep vein thrombosis events, defined by condition occurrences of 'Deep vein thrombosis' conceptset

cohortName: FDA AESI Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) events
logicDescription: All events of Deep Vein Thrombosis with no such events in prior clean window period (365 days). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 1 day.

cohortName: FDA AESI Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) event episodes for incidence characterization
logicDescription: All events of Deep Vein Thrombosis. No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 365 days.
